parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ filterGroups: [{ filters: [{ propertyName: 'name', operator: 'EQ', value: $json.company || '' }] }], properties: ['name', 'domain', 'industry'] }) }}

parameters.query: SELECT m.*, substr(c.connectionSince, 1, 10) as connectionDate FROM input2 m INNER JOIN input1 c ON m.profileUrlNormalized = c.profileUrlNormalized

activeVersion.name: v1
activeVersion.description: Initial run is to rerun every day around 6PM to go into linkedIn, extract the contacts from Kyle, check if there are any new-ones, if so, see if their company is set up, if not, set it up, else, create one, then create new contact and associate it with the company.
